use_case.title: Search for a portal participant
use_case.description: A Portal Participant wants to find participants in a portal meeting certain criteria.

trigger.value: A Portal Participant wants to find participants within a portal meeting certain criteria

use_case.basic_path:
1. The Participant navigates to the "People" tab in the Configure Portal area, and clicks on the "search" link.
  2. The Participant specifies search criteria, which may include participant name and role assignments.
  3. The Participant is presented with a set of matching participants. This listing format shall be the same as that described in as the browse listing described in PSRV-00050 ("Browse Portal Participants").
use_case.success_end_conditions: The Participant finds participants matching the specified criteria.
use_case.open_issues: The complexity of available search parameters is an open issue.
